website_summaries.verdict: The Gateway DX4870-UB2B gives its users what they expect: the latest technology and decent power in an inexpensive desktop PC. It's what we currently recommend for general purpose computing.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The computer was great quality and I've had absolutely no problems with it. The only challenge was learning Windows 8, but that has nothing to do with the product itself. As soon as I downloaded the Start button and menu to look and function like Windows 7 it's been fantastic. Thank you for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great bargain pc
customer_reviews.text: I bought this PC as a HTPC to run my movies and music on. So far so good. Pros: Build-in Wifi Adaptor HDMI 1 TB HD i3 processor Nice optical drive Cons: None, for the money I got exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: phil lovecraft

customer_reviews.title: Died after 15 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 15 months. Then the motherboard failed. Computer is dead. Warranty is only for 12 months. End of story. Buy a Lenovo.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Ford

customer_reviews.title: Gateway DX4870
customer_reviews.text: This unit was brand new. I don't think it was ever touched. Just reboxed. The wireless card does not work but I don't need it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Tbarre

customer_reviews.title: A+ Gateway
customer_reviews.text: All it was promised to be. You have to learn Windows 8. But when you do with this PC you will be very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Some great some not so great
customer_reviews.text: The computer is awesome. Windows 8 not so awesome. I learned that many of my older printers and faxes would not work with windows 8 and there are no software updates to make them work.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Horn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Unit works fine, it is what I expected, a good solid machine.easy set up. Price was the reason that I selected this machine
customer_reviews.author: George Weiss

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THIS SELLER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS ITEM WAS PURCHASED AS A CHRISTMAS PRESENT. IT HAS BEEN USED FOR LESS THAN THREE WEEKS AND NO LONGER POWERS ON. EMAILED SELLER AND THEY HAVE A 90 DAY RETURN POLICY WITH NO ANSWERS AS TO WHAT MAY BE THE PROBLEM. LESSON LEARNED. YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. $300.00 PIECE OF CRAP!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Parker

customer_reviews.title: Piece of cr#@
customer_reviews.text: It reverts all updates on reboots. I could not install games. It froze up several times. I called Gateway. They said that they don't support that problem. They told me to call Microsoft. Microsoft L2 tech remoted into my PC 5 times and could not fix. Stay away. My next computer will be a Mac.
customer_reviews.author: MartyF

customer_reviews.title: GATEWAY DX 4870 UB17
customer_reviews.text: BEING A PREVIOUS GATEWAY CUSTOMER, THIS WAS AN EASY CHOICE FOR ME. IT HAS EVERYTHING YOU NEED (EXCEPT MONITOR) TO GET UP AND RUNNING QUICKLY. IT HAS A HUGE HARD DRIVE AND 6GB OF MEMORY WHICH IS PLENTY FOR THE AVERAGE USER. A BEAUTIFUL CASE PLUS A KEYBORD AND MOUSE AND PLENTY OF USB PORTS PLUS 2 USB 3.0 WHICH SPEEDS UP YOUR UPLOADS OR DOWNLOADS. FOR THE PRICE, IT WOULD BE A WISE CHOICE FOR A COMPUTER. BRIAN ENGEL
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bad Attitude

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this desktop
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this desktop. I bought one a couple of years ago and every now and then it just won't power on. No lights, no hard drive spinning, no nothing. Gateway does not want to address the issue, they won't even pick up the phone, your call gets re-route to a company that just provides software support. Really bad customer service from Gateway. Stay away from it...
customer_reviews.author: JC

product_meta.title: Gateway DX4870-UB17 Core i3-3220 Dual-Core 3.3GHz 6GB 1TB DVD±RW DL Windows 8 w/HDMI, Wireless-N & Bluetooth
product_meta.description: The Gateway DX4870-UB17 is perfect anyone looking for a desktop computer that can handle all of their entertainment and daily computing needs! An Intel Core i5-3330 3.0 GHz quad-core processor and 6 GB of DDR3 RAM makes it easy to multitask between applications. Enjoy high storage capacity thanks to the 1 Terabyte (1 TB) hard drive. Plus, Microsoft Windows 8 64-bit operating system is pre-installed! Save documents, music, videos and other files on DVDs or CDs using the DVD±RW drive. Connect to a wired network via integrated 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN, or get rid of cable clutter and get connected to an 802.11a/b/g/n Wireless network. With Bluetooth 4.0, connecting to Bluetooth-enabled headsets, speakers and other devices is a breeze. Transfer files from SD, MMC, MS, MS PRO and xD-Picture flash memory cards via the Multi-in-One memory card reader. An HDMI port is provided for connecting to a big screen TV so you can see more and do more. With SuperSpeed USB 3.0, USB 2.0, PS/2, VGA and audio ports, the DX4870-UB17 lets you plug in printers, flash drives, digital cameras and other accessories. A mouse and keyboard are included with the Gateway DX4870-UB17 Core i3-3220 3.3 GHz Desktop PC.
